TopicTitle: [0.25] [CONFIG] New Temperature Values For DeadlyReentry v6.2.1 Mod

Articles.Content:
I installed this mod. I'm not attached any heat shield to my lander. But i survived reentry. Just some little parts exploded. I think it's not realistic for Kerbin.

I check some config file of mod and i changed all parts "maxTemp" value to 800 Ã‚Â°C. (Heatshields excluded.) Now is more realistic. When temperature rises to 800 Ã‚Â°C, parts are burning and exploding.

Also, this temperature values compatible all another mod parts.

Download link for config files: http://www./download/7sh3cdaspjsj07a/deadly621_newconfigs.zip

Copy this files to "..\GameData\DeadlyReentry" and replace old files.

Don't forget to backup the original config files.

Edited November 19, 2014 by iCT
